```{r,include=FALSE}
library(DEVISE)
```

```{r,include=FALSE}
Outcome <- c(0, 0, 3, 5, 4, 7, 4, 9)
```

## DEVISE: Standardized Scores

### Transformations

```{r}
trOutcome <- Outcome + 1
```

```{r}
construct(Outcome, trOutcome)
```

### Standardized Scores

```{r}
zOutcome <- scale(Outcome)
```

```{r}
construct(Outcome, trOutcome, zOutcome)
```
